Incomplete form: One or more fields in the form are missing.
Nonexistent ID: The ID you have selected does not exists in the community database. Please select another specie or discard the observation.
Invalid date format: Your date should be in a yyyy-mm-dd format.
Invalid date value: One of your input dates does not exist.
Invalid time interval: Your end date should be bigger than your starting date.
Invalid end date: Your end date cannot be bigger than today's date.
Portal error: The portal from the selected community is giving errors.
Classification API error: Our classification API does not seem to be working. Perhaps it is down or the url has to be updated.
